Hot Ones fans . We promised you a whole year 's worth of brand new hot sauce drops to celebrate our
10th anniversary , and our next reveal delivers on both heat and flavor . Say
hello to Hot Ones tropical amaro inspired by iconic Caribbean
flavors . This sauce unites juicy mango and pineapple with warm curry spices and vibrant yellow
chilies . Sweet scotch bonnet and citrusy fitali peppers bring the heat pushing the Scovilles above
medium and warming you like the island sun . It clocks in at a 6 out of 10 on our spice
scale and we know that it 'll be partying on your plate all summer long with fish tacos ,
grilled chicken , and even burrito bowls . That 's hots.com hotwes.com
hotwes.com to get your hands on our brand new sauce , Hot Ones
Tropical Amaro .
